review:
I visited for Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding
Dr. Harini gave good personal attention to queries & concerns. Her experience in understanding fine details of the problem made me feel in the safe hands. Excellent Service & Follow up guidelines . I am  satisfied with treatment . Congratulations Esthetix Dental on completion of 20 years and on opening the 2nd branch in Jubilee Hills

review:
My 1st son Shikhar 16 yrs, has teeth correction & SS brace treatment procedure got successfull, with that he has a beautiful smile on face to cheer & which build a
lot of  confidence in him... So my 2nd son Puneet 12 yrs, has recently Started same treatment of Teeth correction & SS brace ...hope the same too... Iam Sudhir Gupta father of Shikhar & Puneet has family history of Teeth corrections...So after met Dr. S.Harini,  she explained about the treatment Procedure,  she is very Professional, Especially Careing for kids , Easy to Reach, Follows all the Hygiene Standards in her Clinic ....Atlast She is A Jem of a Person... thank you so much Dr. S.Harini
